translations: n.[脊椎]鬣蜥（iguana 的复数）；美洲蜥蜴

phrs.translation: 鬣蜥, 美洲鬣蜥, 美洲大蜥蜴
恐龙般生活, 活着的恐龙
群岛海鬣蜥, 研究近二十年的加拉帕哥斯群岛海

sentences.sentence: On the island, visitors can go to see Mona Island iguanas (鬣蜥) which live only on Mona Island.
sentences.translation: 在岛上，游客们可以去看仅生活在蒙纳岛的蒙纳岛鬣蜥。

sentences.sentence: Among her favorite animals now: iguanas and sloths.
sentences.translation: 她先在最喜欢的动物里九游：鬣蜥和树懒。

sentences.sentence: DNA evidence has pinned iguanas and chameleons as the closest relatives to snakes.
sentences.translation: dna证据表明鬣蜥和变色龙与蛇的关系最密切。
